bike.description: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, smooth welds, hydroformed top tube, tapered 1 1/8" - 1.5" head tube, BB91 bottom bracket. Rear triangle: Fuji A2-SL custom-butted alloy monostay w/ hydroformed chainstay, cold-forged dropout, post disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: Shimano SLX M675, hydraulic disc, 180/160mm rotor
Fox 32 FLOAT 27.5 Evolution CTD w/ remote lock out, 15mm thru axle, tapered alloy steerer, remote lockout, 100mm travel
Shimano SLX, M675 hollow Tech II w/ integrated spindle, 38/24T
Shimano Deore XT, M786 SGS Shadow, 10-speed
Shimano SLX M678 front / M675 rear, 32H Center Lock disc hubs, Sun Inferno 23 rims
Schwable Racing Ralph, 27.5" x 2.25" folding, 67 tpi
Shimano SXL M675 hydraulic disc w/ Inspec
Oval M650, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 710mm wide, +/- 5mm rise
Oval M713, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M600 w/ hollow CrMo rails
Oval M750, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 400mm
